title: Profile
description: All the best fairytale princesses have the most horrific pasts. Mine just happens to be more horrific than most.  Fantasizing over Vaughn Asher was a dream. Meeting Vaughn Asher was a fairytale. Loving Vaughn Asher was my downfall.  The past is always there. Waiting. Waiting to expose you. Waiting to ruin you. Waiting to take you back.  Sometimes not even a prince can save you.
author: J.A. Huss
